name: Instant Pot® Sausage Queso
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Got a craving for queso but don't want to wait on a slow cooker? Instant Pot® to the rescue! Feel free to use the ground meat of your choice (hamburger, turkey, or chicken) and don't forget the chips!
ingredients: 1 large jalapeno pepper, seeded and diced
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle light beer
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chiles
directions: Crumble sausage in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat until no longer pink, about 5 minutes
Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function
Add olive oil, onion, and jalapeno; cook for 3 minutes
Add chili powder and cumin and cook for 2 minutes more
Stir in sausage, beer, and tomatoes
Select Manual; set timer for 5 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes
Add Cheddar and Monterey Jack cheeses; whisk vigorously until melted
